title: What is the future of Java developers? Will they compete with trending technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: The future of java is very secure as of now. I can say that on the basis of following points As per technical advancements: JAVA related technologies/frameworks is constantly getting innovated and matched with the latest technological enhancements. You can check the latest releases of Java, the adoption of Microservices architecture in spring ecosystem and much more.Business requirements: Most of the banking sectors applications are built on these technologies and it is not easy to upgrade them just because some other cool technology came in the market.Easily available developers/managers: They are a lot of developers/managers having experience on those technologies and it is easy to hire them.Experience: There are abundance of experience available in this technology stack and it is very valuable asset for any business decision making.Though, In future, some other technologies replace the demand, being a developer you should develop thing using any tools available in your hand. Language is a just tool to solve problem. Happy Learning!

Java is rising more popularity today, the future of java seems to lay with mobile apps and game as it is still the primary language for mobile development. Given that Java continues to have perfectly governance and community, I see it having good security. Reference by image Top 10 of Programming Languages with the Highest Salaries In 2017  Above image Java is more popular to compare of other programming language in future flow.

The graph shows that there has been consist demand for Java programming Language . For 5 years from now we can still predict/assume that the demand for Java Programming will remain high so is the future of developers. But its always better to keep upgrading ourself with new technologies to survive and be an asset for our employers.

I feel Java developers future is still bright as the language itself is in great demand. Hadoop infrastructure is fully built on Java. The only thing is Java developer needs to increase there horizon like have only core Java skills will make life difficult in near future. Try out One Minute Java mobile app and Facebook page for latest java trends

Doing comparison with other techs is bit difficult but Being a Java Developer if you cop up with latest modules/ advancement then no possibility of getting lagged from others, able to secure perfect position for yourself in the market.
